(( BSO keeps the exact effects of skills--especially those that aren't accessible yet--somewhat nebulous, and naturally I try to as well, regardless of some of the "pain" associated with typical EXP votes. However, >>44267902 is on the right path in regards to the effect of Titan's Strength. That Titan's Grip requires Dual Wield Mastery to unlock should allow some anons to make a similar conjecture as to its effect. ))
